channel.title: Java Applet Positioning
channel.description:
Hi! :)
I'm trying to put a Java applet over a Flash applet. However I only want it to open the Java applet at a certain point. I know Flash contains a bit of JavaScript that can be used to hide and display the Java applet, but my true question is how to position the applet in HTML. I know CSS but not enough for this. :|
If this is the wrong section sorrys, but i'm trying to do this for my client so I guess it is client help? Mks whatever. :confused:
Replys! ;)

item.title: Java Applet Positioning
item.dc:creator: @oniscape oniscape
item.description:
@oniscape wrote:

Hi!

I’m trying to put a Java applet over a Flash applet. However I only want it to open the Java applet at a certain point. I know Flash contains a bit of JavaScript that can be used to hide and display the Java applet, but my true question is how to position the applet in HTML. I know CSS but not enough for this.

If this is the wrong section sorrys, but i’m trying to do this for my client so I guess it is client help? Mks whatever.

Replys!

Read full topic
